title: Why can't I mute incoming calls when using a smart case?
answer:
Touch Settings > Motion control > Flip, and turn on Mute incoming calls. When you have an incoming call, flip your phone over to mute the call and stop the vibration. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140548)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140549)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140550)

 Press the volume button when you have an incoming call to mute the call.
